days.text: Mainly fine. Force 2 to 4 northeasterly winds, becoming south to southeasterlies.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 2 to 4 east to southeasterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Mist at first. Force 2 to 3 east to southeasterly winds.
Mainly cloudy. A few rain patches. Force 3 to 4 easterly winds, occasionally force 5.
Mainly cloudy. Mist in the morning and at night. A few rain patches. Force 2 to 3 easterly winds.
